channel.title: [PI] Make yourself unbannable
channel.description: Is there a way to make yourself unbannable?

item.title: [PI] Make yourself unbannable
item.dc:creator: @BitchPk BitchPk
item.description:
@BitchPk wrote:

^

Handy, im gona do it with the ::Xteleto and Xteletome command

My staff keeps teleporting me.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Make yourself unbannable
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:3, topic:445674”]If you can’t trust your staff enough so they won’t ban you, I think you should pick better staff.

Also, to make yourself not be able to be banned, would be a simple check.

Wherever the banning of a specific user is handled (i.e: the command) add a check, similar to this:

if (command.equals("ban")) { if (command.substring(4).equalsIgnoreCase("atomicint")) { player.getPacketSender().sendMessage("You cannot punish this user."); return; } // continue with the process of banning a player. }[/quote]

if (command.equals("ban")) { if (playerCommand.substring(4).equalsIgnoreCase("atomicint")) { c.sendMessage("You cannot punish this user."); return; } // continue with the process of banning a player. }
Fixed for PI just incase anyone finds this (:

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Make yourself unbannable
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

If you can’t trust your staff enough so they won’t ban you, I think you should pick better staff.

Also, to make yourself not be able to be banned, would be a simple check.

Wherever the banning of a specific user is handled (i.e: the command) add a check, similar to this:

if (command.equals("ban")) { if (command.substring(4).equalsIgnoreCase("atomicint")) { player.getPacketSender().sendMessage("You cannot punish this user."); return; } // continue with the process of banning a player. }

Read full topic
